title: Toshtosh Deliveries - Professional Delivery Service Nationwide
cta_whatsapp: Click for Support and Guidance on WhatsApp
hero_text1: An advanced system for creating online bookings from anywhere; the software is user-friendly and easy to use.
hero_text2: Due to the development of the tourism and events industry, there is a desire to provide a solution specifically for business owners who make daily bookings and are looking for a quick and convenient solution in the field of leisure and events.
hero_text3: With BizOnline, bookings are made with a click from anywhere, and the BizOnline booking calendar has many technological features.
hero_text4: So who among us hasn't dreamed of a simple way to manage the business? That's why we're here :-)
about_heading: We Provide All the Tools for Your Success
benefit1: Digital signature that updates immediately upon customer signing and appears in the software as signed.
benefit2: Credit card processing through a terminal that the company will set up for you and can also issue invoices.
benefit3: Digital occupancy calendar for managing bookings from anywhere.
benefit4: Advanced reports and statistics for business management.
benefit5: Ability to integrate with Booking and other websites.
showcase_heading: Take a Peek at Our System
review_text1: "I started using BizOnline, and my business has improved significantly. The system is friendly and easy to use."
review_text2: "Thanks to BizOnline, I manage my bookings more efficiently and quickly. Highly recommended!"
review_text3: "The system allows me to easily track bookings and stay in touch with customers."
review_text4: "Excellent customer service and a system that fits exactly the needs of my business."
contact_subheading: We are happy to assist you with any questions or requests. Contact us now for more information and a personalized quote!
tutorial_answer_text1: Para fazer login no sistema, insira o nome de usuário e a senha fornecidos durante o registro.
tutorial_answer_text2: Para criar uma nova reserva, clique no botão "Nova Reserva" e preencha os detalhes do cliente e da reserva.
tutorial_answer_text3: Para gerenciar o calendário de ocupação, você pode visualizar e editar a disponibilidade do seu negócio através do painel principal.
